titles.title: God Will Take Care Of You

authors.author: Civilla D. Martin Walter Stillman Martin

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: God will take care of you. newline Thro' every day, o'er all the way, newline He will take care of you; newline God will take care of you.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Be not dismayed whate'er betide, newline God will take care of you; newline Beneath His wings of love abide, newline God will take care of you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thro' days of toil, newline When heart doth fail, newline God will take care of you; newline When dangers fierce your path assail, newline God will take care of you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All you may need He will provide, newline God will take care of you; newline Nothing you ask will be denied, newline God will take care of you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: No matter what may be the test, newline God will take care of you; newline Lean, weary one, upon His breast, newline God will take care of you.
